Projects

Projects

RECON is a collection of R packages and tools. Here is a list of some projects that have come out of RECON.

epimatch

Finding matching patient records across tabular data sets

epicontacts

Handling, Visualisation and Analysis of Epidemiological Contacts

cleanr

Ideas in large scale data cleaning without ending up with a massive pile of messy cleaning code
